law.text: As used in this chapter, unless the context requires otherwise, "will" means a last will or testament, codicil, appointment by will, writing in the nature of a will in exercise of a power, and any other testamentary disposition.
law.history: Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 1 (1). -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4824.
